title: Enchanting Pearl & Diamond Cascade Haaram Set
materials: Natural Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: This exquisite set features a floral-inspired design, meticulously crafted with intricately set CZ diamonds that mimic the brilliance of real diamonds. The necklace boasts a cascading design with pearl drops, echoing the same graceful pattern in the accompanying jhumka-style earrings. The intricate filigree work captures the essence of traditional South Indian craftsmanship, blending seamlessly with a modern aesthetic. The necklace's chain is a sleek and flexible mesh-style design.
colors: Primarily gold with dazzling white CZ diamonds and creamy white pearls.
occasions: and formal gatherings. Can also add a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits.
description: This dazzling set offers the look of fine diamond jewelry at an accessible price point. The classic Haaram style gets a contemporary update with the lightweight CZ diamonds and pearl accents. The set is versatile enough to be worn with both traditional Indian attire and modern evening wear. High-quality materials ensure durability and lasting shine. The Hyderabadi polish provides a rich, luxurious gleam that sets this piece apart.
